name: Doctor (General Practitioner)
description: General medical practitioner providing primary healthcare services

name: Medical Officer
description: Medical professional responsible for clinical care and administrative duties

name: Resident Doctor
description: Medical graduate undergoing specialized training in a medical specialty

name: Consultant Physician
description: Senior medical specialist providing expert consultation and treatment

name: Surgeon (General)
description: Medical specialist performing surgical procedures

name: Cardiothoracic Surgeon
description: Specialist surgeon focusing on heart and chest surgery

name: Neurosurgeon
description: Specialist surgeon focusing on brain and nervous system surgery

name: Orthopedic Surgeon
description: Specialist surgeon focusing on musculoskeletal system

name: Plastic Surgeon
description: Specialist surgeon focusing on reconstructive and cosmetic surgery

name: Vascular Surgeon
description: Specialist surgeon focusing on blood vessel surgery

name: Urologist
description: Medical specialist focusing on urinary tract and male reproductive system

name: ENT Surgeon (Otolaryngologist)
description: Specialist surgeon focusing on ear, nose, and throat conditions

name: Ophthalmologist
description: Medical specialist focusing on eye and vision care

name: Obstetrician & Gynecologist (OB/GYN)
description: Medical specialist focusing on women's reproductive health

name: Pediatrician
description: Medical specialist focusing on children's health and development

name: Anesthesiologist
description: Medical specialist providing anesthesia and perioperative care

name: Radiologist
description: Medical specialist interpreting medical imaging studies

name: Pathologist
description: Medical specialist diagnosing diseases through laboratory analysis

name: Psychiatrist
description: Medical specialist focusing on mental health and psychiatric disorders

name: Dermatologist
description: Medical specialist focusing on skin, hair, and nail conditions

name: Endocrinologist
description: Medical specialist focusing on hormonal and metabolic disorders

name: Gastroenterologist
description: Medical specialist focusing on digestive system disorders

name: Nephrologist
description: Medical specialist focusing on kidney diseases

name: Pulmonologist
description: Medical specialist focusing on respiratory system disorders

name: Oncologist
description: Medical specialist focusing on cancer diagnosis and treatment

name: Rheumatologist
description: Medical specialist focusing on autoimmune and inflammatory conditions

name: Neurologist
description: Medical specialist focusing on nervous system disorders

name: Infectious Disease Specialist
description: Medical specialist focusing on infectious diseases and antimicrobial therapy

name: Emergency Medicine Physician
description: Medical specialist providing emergency and urgent care

name: Intensivist / Critical Care Physician
description: Medical specialist providing intensive care for critically ill patients

name: Registered Nurse (RN)
description: Licensed nursing professional providing direct patient care

name: Staff Nurse
description: Registered nurse providing bedside patient care in hospital units

name: Senior Staff Nurse
description: Experienced registered nurse with additional responsibilities and mentoring duties

name: Charge Nurse
description: Registered nurse responsible for coordinating care and supervising staff on a unit

name: Nurse Supervisor
description: Senior nursing professional overseeing nursing operations and staff

name: Nursing Manager
description: Administrative nursing leader managing nursing departments and operations

name: ICU Nurse
description: Specialized nurse providing care for critically ill patients in intensive care units

name: CCU Nurse
description: Specialized nurse providing care for cardiac patients in coronary care units

name: ER Nurse
description: Specialized nurse providing emergency and urgent care services

name: OR/OT Nurse (Scrub/Circulating)
description: Specialized nurse assisting in surgical procedures and operating room management

name: PACU Nurse
description: Specialized nurse providing post-anesthesia recovery care

name: NICU Nurse
description: Specialized nurse providing care for newborns in neonatal intensive care units

name: PICU Nurse
description: Specialized nurse providing care for children in pediatric intensive care units

name: Dialysis Nurse
description: Specialized nurse providing care for patients undergoing dialysis treatment

name: Oncology Nurse
description: Specialized nurse providing care for cancer patients and chemotherapy administration

name: Cath Lab Nurse
description: Specialized nurse assisting in cardiac catheterization procedures

name: Home Care Nurse
description: Registered nurse providing healthcare services in patients' homes

name: Community Health Nurse
description: Registered nurse focusing on public health and community wellness programs

name: Midwife
description: Healthcare professional specializing in pregnancy, childbirth, and postpartum care

name: Nurse Educator
description: Nursing professional responsible for education and training of nursing staff

name: Nurse Practitioner
description: Advanced practice registered nurse with expanded scope of practice

name: Pharmacist
description: Healthcare professional specializing in medication therapy and pharmaceutical care

name: Pharmacy Technician
description: Healthcare support professional assisting pharmacists with medication preparation

name: Physiotherapist
description: Healthcare professional specializing in physical rehabilitation and movement therapy

name: Occupational Therapist
description: Healthcare professional helping patients develop or recover daily living skills

name: Speech & Language Therapist
description: Healthcare professional treating communication and swallowing disorders

name: Respiratory Therapist
description: Healthcare professional specializing in respiratory care and breathing treatments

name: Radiographer / Imaging Technologist
description: Healthcare professional performing medical imaging procedures

name: Lab Technologist / Medical Laboratory Scientist
description: Healthcare professional performing laboratory tests and analysis

name: Phlebotomist
description: Healthcare professional specializing in blood collection and specimen handling

name: Dietitian / Nutritionist
description: Healthcare professional specializing in nutrition therapy and dietary counseling

name: Optometrist
description: Healthcare professional specializing in eye care and vision correction

name: Dental Surgeon (Dentist)
description: Healthcare professional specializing in oral health and dental procedures

name: Dental Hygienist
description: Healthcare professional providing preventive dental care and oral health education

name: Dental Assistant
description: Healthcare support professional assisting dentists with patient care and procedures

name: Medical Director
description: Senior physician providing clinical leadership and medical oversight

name: Director of Nursing (DoN)
description: Senior nursing executive overseeing all nursing operations and quality

name: Chief Medical Officer (CMO)
description: Executive physician responsible for clinical strategy and medical affairs

name: Clinical Coordinator
description: Healthcare professional coordinating clinical operations and patient care activities

name: Quality & Accreditation Coordinator
description: Healthcare professional managing quality improvement and accreditation processes

name: Infection Control Nurse / Officer
description: Healthcare professional specializing in infection prevention and control programs

name: Case Manager
description: Healthcare professional coordinating patient care and discharge planning

name: Patient Safety Officer
description: Healthcare professional focused on patient safety initiatives and risk management

name: Hospital Administrator
description: Executive professional managing overall hospital operations and strategic planning

name: Operations Manager
description: Management professional overseeing day-to-day operational activities

name: HR Executive
description: Human resources professional managing employee relations and HR processes

name: HR Manager
description: Senior human resources professional leading HR strategy and operations

name: Talent Acquisition Specialist
description: HR professional specializing in recruitment and talent sourcing

name: Public Relations Officer (PRO)
description: Professional managing external communications and public relations

name: Front Office Executive / Receptionist
description: Administrative professional managing front desk operations and patient reception

name: Medical Records Officer (HIS/MR)
description: Professional managing medical records and health information systems

name: Billing Executive
description: Administrative professional managing patient billing and revenue cycle

name: Billing Manager
description: Management professional overseeing billing operations and revenue management

name: Insurance Coordinator
description: Administrative professional managing insurance claims and authorization processes

name: Accounts Executive
description: Finance professional managing accounts and financial transactions

name: Accounts Manager
description: Senior finance professional overseeing accounting operations and financial reporting

name: Finance Executive
description: Finance professional managing financial planning and analysis

name: Finance Manager
description: Senior finance professional leading financial strategy and operations

name: Procurement Executive
description: Professional managing purchasing and vendor relationships

name: Procurement Manager
description: Senior professional overseeing procurement strategy and supply chain management

name: Store Keeper / Inventory Controller
description: Professional managing inventory control and warehouse operations

name: IT Support Engineer
description: Technical professional providing IT support and system maintenance

name: Systems Administrator
description: IT professional managing computer systems and network infrastructure

name: Data Entry Operator
description: Administrative professional responsible for accurate data input and management

name: Housekeeping Supervisor
description: Supervisory professional overseeing cleaning and maintenance operations

name: Security Supervisor
description: Supervisory professional managing security operations and safety protocols

name: Transport Coordinator
description: Professional coordinating patient transport and logistics services
